credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for the top of a fountain
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink, lead pencil on paper.
description: Pluto abducting Proserpine and a putto driving Cerberus with a trident are on top of a rock, out of which flames lick.
name: Drawing
